mapper.select: select s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_description, s.shop_address, s.phone, s.shop_image, s.priority, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, s.enable_status, s.advice, a.area_id, a.area_name, sc.shop_category_id, sc.shop_category_name, u.user_id, u.name FROM tb_shop s, tb_area a, tb_shop_category sc, tb_user u where s.area_id = a.area_id and s.shop_category_id = sc.shop_category_id and s.owner_id = u.user_id order by priority desc limit #{rowIndex},#{pageSize};

select s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_description, s.shop_address, s.phone, s.shop_image, s.priority, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, s.enable_status, s.advice, a.area_id, a.area_name, sc.shop_category_id, sc.shop_category_name, u.name, u.user_id FROM tb_shop s, tb_area a, tb_shop_category sc, tb_user u WHERE s.area_id = a.area_id and s.shop_category_id = sc.shop_category_id and s.owner_id = u.user_id and s.shop_id = #{shopId}
